text:
I chose this type of studies cause I always want to be reporter. Recently, I discovered the work of being a community manager. I will explain in two parts why I love this two works and why I think they are important in the futur.
In first, the profession of journalist. I know, with this type of studies, I can be a journalist one day. I always want to be one because reporters work all around the world and are always connected with the news. It's a work where we can't predict what will happen so I think it's very exciting. As well, have the problem of a routine is impossible with this type of work. There is none situation especially who inspire me but the idea of travel all around the world is for me the best way to work.
For the profession of community manager, I discovered it more recently, when I was making search about the opportunies of work that my studies can give me. Around me, they were always CM on social network like Twitter, Instagrame etc... But I realize that very late. I love this work because it's the best way to work on internet, talk with a lot of people but also keep my anonymity. With that work, I could promote think I like and particularity sports and especially the volleyball. I could be the community manager of the national team of Paris or something like that. The Community manager of Netflix or Burger King are very famous on twitter because they arer very kind, funny and interact a lot with the famous influenceurs of Twitter. Recently, Burger King create a burger at the image of Arkunir, a famous young boy of Twitter. This type of collaboration is cool and create a lot of visibility for the influenceur,like Alex Dupont,that I think, deserve a lot visibility.
More generaly, I want to have a work on internet where I can talk and diffuse informations about something I like and inspired me.
